mapper.insert: INSERT INTO kh_card_list (HUB_IF_KEY, HIST_ROW_KEY, CORP_BIZ_NO, FCODE, FCODE_NM, CARD_NO, ISSUE_DATE, TMNT_DATE, PAUSE_DATE, VALIDITY, STAT, STAT_NM, PART_NM, USER_NM, SETT_DATE, SETT_BANK, SETT_BANK_NM, SETT_ACCT, BEFORE_CARD_NO, REGR_DH, REGR_ID, REGR_NM) VALUES( #{HUB_IF_KEY}, #{HIST_ROW_KEY}, #{CORP_BIZ_NO}, #{FCODE}, #{FCODE_NM}, #{CARD_NO}, #{ISSUE_DATE}, #{TMNT_DATE}, #{PAUSE_DATE}, #{VALIDITY}, #{STAT}, #{STAT_NM}, #{PART_NM}, #{USER_NM}, #{SETT_DATE}, #{SETT_BANK}, #{SETT_BANK_NM}, #{SETT_ACCT}, #{BEFORE_CARD_NO}, REGR_DH(), #{g_userId}, #{g_userNm});

INSERT INTO kh_card_acquire (HUB_IF_KEY, HIST_ROW_KEY, CORP_BIZ_NO, FCODE, FCODE_NM, CARD_NO, STATE, STATE_NM, PURCH_DATE, PURCH_TIME, COLL_NO, APPR_DATE, APPR_TIME, APPR_NO, PART_CANCEL, PART_CANCEL_NM, NONE_APPR, NONE_APPR_NM, CUR_CD, ACQU_AMT_TOT, ACQU_AMT_KRW, ACQU_AMT_USD, ACQU_AMT_CUR, ACQU_EXCH, ACQU_FEE, CONV_FEE, APPR_AMT_TOT, APPR_AMT, VAT, TIPS, DISC_AMT, ABROAD, ABROAD_NM, INST_TYPE, INST_TYPE_NM, INST_MONTH, MERCH_NAME, MERCH_BIZ_NO, MERCH_NO, MERCH_MCC_NAME, MERCH_MCC_CODE, MERCH_TEL, MERCH_ZIPCODE, MERCH_ADDR1, MERCH_ADDR2, MERCH_CEO, MERCH_TAX_TYPE, MERCH_TAX_TYPE_NM, MERCH_CLO_DATE, MERCH_NTS_DATE, REGR_DH, REGR_ID, REGR_NM) VALUES(#{HUB_IF_KEY}, #{HIST_ROW_KEY}, #{CORP_BIZ_NO}, #{FCODE}, #{FCODE_NM}, #{CARD_NO}, #{STATE}, #{STATE_NM}, #{PURCH_DATE}, #{PURCH_TIME}, #{COLL_NO}, #{APPR_DATE}, #{APPR_TIME}, #{APPR_NO}, #{PART_CANCEL}, #{PART_CANCEL_NM}, #{NONE_APPR}, #{NONE_APPR_NM}, #{CUR_CD}, #{ACQU_AMT_TOT}, #{ACQU_AMT_KRW}, #{ACQU_AMT_USD}, #{ACQU_AMT_CUR}, #{ACQU_EXCH}, #{ACQU_FEE}, #{CONV_FEE}, #{APPR_AMT_TOT}, #{APPR_AMT}, #{VAT}, #{TIPS}, #{DISC_AMT}, #{ABROAD}, #{ABROAD_NM}, #{INST_TYPE}, #{INST_TYPE_NM}, #{INST_MONTH}, #{MERCH_NAME}, #{MERCH_BIZ_NO}, #{MERCH_NO}, #{MERCH_MCC_NAME}, #{MERCH_MCC_CODE}, #{MERCH_TEL}, #{MERCH_ZIPCODE}, #{MERCH_ADDR1}, #{MERCH_ADDR2}, #{MERCH_CEO}, #{MERCH_TAX_TYPE}, #{MERCH_TAX_TYPE_NM}, #{MERCH_CLO_DATE}, #{MERCH_NTS_DATE}, REGR_DH(), #{g_userId}, #{g_userNm});

INSERT INTO kh_card_appr (HUB_IF_KEY, HIST_ROW_KEY, CORP_BIZ_NO, FCODE, FCODE_NM, CARD_NO, APPR_DATE, APPR_TIME, APPR_NO, STATE, STATE_NM, PART_CANCEL, PART_CANCEL_NM, CUR_CD, APPR_AMT_TOT, APPR_AMT, VAT, TIPS, ABROAD, ABROAD_NM, INST_TYPE, INST_TYPE_NM, INST_MONTH, MERCH_NAME, MERCH_BIZ_NO, MERCH_NO, MERCH_MCC_NAME, MERCH_MCC_CODE, MERCH_TEL, MERCH_ZIPCODE, MERCH_ADDR1, MERCH_ADDR2, MERCH_CEO, MERCH_TAX_TYPE, MERCH_TAX_TYPE_NM, MERCH_CLO_DATE, MERCH_NTS_DATE, REGR_DH, REGR_ID, REGR_NM) VALUES(#{HUB_IF_KEY}, #{HIST_ROW_KEY}, #{CORP_BIZ_NO}, #{FCODE}, #{FCODE_NM}, #{CARD_NO}, #{APPR_DATE}, #{APPR_TIME}, #{APPR_NO}, #{STATE}, #{STATE_NM}, #{PART_CANCEL}, #{PART_CANCEL_NM}, #{CUR_CD}, #{APPR_AMT_TOT}, #{APPR_AMT}, #{VAT}, #{TIPS}, #{ABROAD}, #{ABROAD_NM}, #{INST_TYPE}, #{INST_TYPE_NM}, #{INST_MONTH}, #{MERCH_NAME}, #{MERCH_BIZ_NO}, #{MERCH_NO}, #{MERCH_MCC_NAME}, #{MERCH_MCC_CODE}, #{MERCH_TEL}, #{MERCH_ZIPCODE}, #{MERCH_ADDR1}, #{MERCH_ADDR2}, #{MERCH_CEO}, #{MERCH_TAX_TYPE}, #{MERCH_TAX_TYPE_NM}, #{MERCH_CLO_DATE}, #{MERCH_NTS_DATE}, REGR_DH(), #{g_userId}, #{g_userNm});

INSERT INTO kh_card_bill (HUB_IF_KEY, HIST_ROW_KEY, CORP_BIZ_NO, FCODE, FCODE_NM, CARD_NO, BILL_MONTH, STATE, STATE_NM, BILL_AMT_TOT, BILL_AMT, BILL_FEE, APPR_NO, COLL_NO, TRAN_DATE, TRAN_TIME, TRAN_AMT, ACQU_AMT_USD, ACQU_EXCH, CONV_FEE, MEMBERSHIP_FEE, SETT_DATE, INST_TYPE, INST_TYPE_NM, INST_MONTH, INST_REST_MONTH, MERCH_NAME, MERCH_BIZ_NO, MERCH_TAX_TYPE, MERCH_TAX_TYPE_NM, MERCH_CLO_DATE, MERCH_NTS_DATE, REGR_DH, REGR_ID, REGR_NM) VALUES(#{HUB_IF_KEY}, #{HIST_ROW_KEY}, #{CORP_BIZ_NO}, #{FCODE}, #{FCODE_NM}, #{CARD_NO}, #{BILL_MONTH}, #{STATE}, #{STATE_NM}, #{BILL_AMT_TOT}, #{BILL_AMT}, #{BILL_FEE}, #{APPR_NO}, #{COLL_NO}, #{TRAN_DATE}, #{TRAN_TIME}, #{TRAN_AMT}, #{ACQU_AMT_USD}, #{ACQU_EXCH}, #{CONV_FEE}, #{MEMBERSHIP_FEE}, #{SETT_DATE}, #{INST_TYPE}, #{INST_TYPE_NM}, #{INST_MONTH}, #{INST_REST_MONTH}, #{MERCH_NAME}, #{MERCH_BIZ_NO}, #{MERCH_TAX_TYPE}, #{MERCH_TAX_TYPE_NM}, #{MERCH_CLO_DATE}, #{MERCH_NTS_DATE}, REGR_DH(), #{g_userId}, #{g_userNm});

INSERT INTO kh_card_limit (HUB_IF_KEY, HIST_ROW_KEY, CORP_BIZ_NO, FCODE, FCODE_NM, CARD_NO, CARD_LMT, CARD_REST_LMT, ABROAD_LMT, ABROAD_REST_LMT, REGR_DH, REGR_ID, REGR_NM) VALUES(#{HUB_IF_KEY}, #{HIST_ROW_KEY}, #{CORP_BIZ_NO}, #{FCODE}, #{FCODE_NM}, #{CARD_NO}, #{CARD_LMT}, #{CARD_REST_LMT}, #{ABROAD_LMT}, #{ABROAD_REST_LMT}, REGR_DH(), #{g_userId}, #{g_userNm};

INSERT INTO kh_cash_list (HUB_IF_KEY, HIST_ROW_KEY, CORP_BIZ_NO, DOC_TYPE, DOC_TYPE_NM, TRAN_DD, TRAN_HH, APPR_NO, AMT_TOT, AMT_SUPPLY, AMT_TAX, AMT_TIP, ISSUE_METHOD, TRAN_GB, TRAN_GB_NM, USER_NAME, MERCH_BIZ_NO, MERCH_NAME, EXEMPTION_YN, EXEMPTION_YN_NM, ISSUE_TYPE, ISSUE_TYPE_NM, REMARK, REGR_DH, REGR_ID, REGR_NM) VALUES(#{HUB_IF_KEY}, #{HIST_ROW_KEY}, #{CORP_BIZ_NO}, #{DOC_TYPE}, #{DOC_TYPE_NM}, #{TRAN_DD}, #{TRAN_HH}, #{APPR_NO}, #{AMT_TOT}, #{AMT_SUPPLY}, #{AMT_TAX}, #{AMT_TIP}, #{ISSUE_METHOD}, #{TRAN_GB}, #{TRAN_GB_NM}, #{USER_NAME}, #{MERCH_BIZ_NO}, #{MERCH_NAME}, #{EXEMPTION_YN}, #{EXEMPTION_YN_NM}, #{ISSUE_TYPE}, #{ISSUE_TYPE_NM}, #{REMARK}, REGR_DH(), #{g_userId}, #{g_userNm});

INSERT INTO kh_tax_item_list (HUB_IF_KEY, HIST_ROW_KEY, SEQ, ITEM_DD, ITEM_NM, ITEM_SPEC, ITEM_CNT, ITEM_AMT_UNIT, ITEM_AMT_SUPPLY, ITEM_AMT_TAX, ITEM_REMARK, REGR_DH, REGR_ID, REGR_NM) VALUES(#{HUB_IF_KEY}, #{HIST_ROW_KEY}, #{SEQ}, #{ITEM_DD}, #{ITEM_NM}, #{ITEM_SPEC}, #{ITEM_CNT}, #{ITEM_AMT_UNIT}, #{ITEM_AMT_SUPPLY}, #{ITEM_AMT_TAX}, #{ITEM_REMARK}, REGR_DH(), #{g_userId}, #{g_userNm});

INSERT INTO kh_tax_list (HUB_IF_KEY, HIST_ROW_KEY, CORP_BIZ_NO, CATEGORY, CATEGORY_NM, DOC_TYPE, DOC_TYPE_NM, MAKE_DD, ISSUE_DD, SEND_DD, APPR_NO, AMT_TOT, AMT_SUPPLY, AMT_TAX, ISSUE_TYPE, ISSUE_TYPE_NM, ISSUE_TYPE_DTL, ISSUE_TYPE_DTL_NM, ISSUE_CLASS, ISSUE_CLASS_NM, ISSUE_KIND, ISSUE_KIND_NM, REMARK1, COMP_BIZ_NO, COMP_SUB_NO, COMP_NM, COMP_CEO, COMP_ADDR, COMP_MNG_EMAIL, CUST_BIZ_NO, CUST_SUB_NO, CUST_NM, CUST_CEO, CUST_ADDR, CUST_MNG_EMAIL, CUST_MNG_SUB_EMAIL, CONSIGN_BIZ_NO, CONSIGN_NM, ITEM_DD, ITEM_NM, ITEM_SPEC, ITEM_CNT, ITEM_AMT_UNIT, ITEM_AMT_SUPPLY, ITEM_AMT_TAX, ITEM_REMARK, REGR_DH, REGR_ID, REGR_NM) VALUES(#{HUB_IF_KEY}, #{HIST_ROW_KEY}, #{CORP_BIZ_NO}, #{CATEGORY}, #{CATEGORY_NM}, #{DOC_TYPE}, #{DOC_TYPE_NM}, #{MAKE_DD}, #{ISSUE_DD}, #{SEND_DD}, #{APPR_NO}, #{AMT_TOT}, #{AMT_SUPPLY}, #{AMT_TAX}, #{ISSUE_TYPE}, #{ISSUE_TYPE_NM}, #{ISSUE_TYPE_DTL}, #{ISSUE_TYPE_DTL_NM}, #{ISSUE_CLASS}, #{ISSUE_CLASS_NM}, #{ISSUE_KIND}, #{ISSUE_KIND_NM}, #{REMARK1}, #{COMP_BIZ_NO}, #{COMP_SUB_NO}, #{COMP_NM}, #{COMP_CEO}, #{COMP_ADDR}, #{COMP_MNG_EMAIL}, #{CUST_BIZ_NO}, #{CUST_SUB_NO}, #{CUST_NM}, #{CUST_CEO}, #{CUST_ADDR}, #{CUST_MNG_EMAIL}, #{CUST_MNG_SUB_EMAIL}, #{CONSIGN_BIZ_NO}, #{CONSIGN_NM}, #{ITEM_DD}, #{ITEM_NM}, #{ITEM_SPEC}, #{ITEM_CNT}, #{ITEM_AMT_UNIT}, #{ITEM_AMT_SUPPLY}, #{ITEM_AMT_TAX}, #{ITEM_REMARK}, REGR_DH(), #{g_userId}, #{g_userNm});
